snippet: Eleven Iranians kidnapped in Syria have been released, but 18 others are being held hostage, Iran’s deputy foreign minister, Hossein Amir Abdollahian, said Wednesday.
abstract: Eleven Iranians kidnapped in Syria are released, but 18 others are being held hostage; officials say kidnappers want to pressure Tehran to abandon its support for Syria’s president, Bashar al-Assad, who is facing an 11-month revolt.
lead_paragraph: Eleven Iranians kidnapped in Syria have been released, but 18 others are being held hostage, Iran’s deputy foreign minister, Hossein Amir Abdollahian, said Wednesday.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
